title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Fry bacon until crispy. Whisk eggs and parmesan together. Mix everything and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spice. Grill until cooked. Simmer tomato puree with cream. Combine and serve.
